captions.text: Mika, Mika, Mikaaa!!!

Ok, Katy, It's time to go. I packed the car.
Come on, let's go. Let's just get outta here.

Let's leave right now. Come on, it's time
to go.
I think it's better if we stay.
What?? What are you talking about?
Come on, this is insane! Let's get outta here.
I think we'll be ok now.
Whoa, did you??
Did you just speak in two voices at once??
Nope.
Yes, you did! Oh my gosh.
Are you smiling??

Ok well you are clearly possessed and that
is just way too much baggage for me to deal with,
so uh, I'm out.
Alright? Ok. Goodbye forever!!
Goodbye!
Do you see this??
Hunter is literally floating out of his crib.

Oh my gosh. This footage is so revealing.
I.. can't believe we didn't look at it before.
What are we gonna do??
I need to make a phone call.

I can't believe we almost channeled that thing
into another family member!
I know.
So.. I hate to do this. But...

we're gonna have
to break up.
Whaatttt? Why??

Well, you're daughters like to hang out with
this Toby demon that picks 'em up by the hair
and throws 'em around
He also scratched my friend. I just--

I just--
I just don't feel like this is gonna end well for me.

Look, we can all just go move in with my witch
mom and her witch friends.
There's even a twin bed we can share.
Ha! Move in with your witch mom and demon befriending daughters...
when we've only been together a few months.
Yea, that sounds great!

I'll uh-- I'll start packing the car right
now, ok?
I'm never coming back to this crazy family!
Ahhhh (car driving away)
Mom! Toby won't let go of my hair!!
Who cares, Katy??
Your imaginary friend made me lose another man!
You're a bad mom.
Boo!!! Hahahahha
My name's Toby.

title: How Paranormal Activity Should Have Ended

comments.author: Lord Astrea

comments.text:
+ValorPictures Agreed! I think the most horrifying movies deal with the 
supernatural, especially ones that are based or inspired by actual claims. 
My friend's house is 100% definitely haunted and they have so many stories! 
It wouldn't make a good movie because there's no fluid storyline, but it'd 
definitely make a creepy documentary or re-enactment show.
comments.author: Eric Paris

comments.text:
+ValorPictures Because they can easily be pictured as stupid and harmless 
things that are knocking things over because they can't do anything else. I 
mean, what kind of actually terrifying being would just knock down cereal 
boxes instead of do something less pointlessly stupid?

comments.author: Judge Dredd

comments.text:
+Judge Dredd Yup that tends to happen with popular shonen shows (though I 
have not found a series with worse filler than Naruto). Its the main reason 
I prefer horror or mystery anime; most have a nice buildup and then an 
awesome reveal right after rather than waiting around through a season of 
subplots.
PS. The Fate series is awesome, nice choice. Unlimited Bladeworks is the 
shit right now :3
comments.author: CrystalEcho

+Auxiliary that's why anime like fate/zero is still 10x times better than 
naruto.

plot but when your expecting a fight suddenly a damn filler episode comes 
in your way and that gives you away from the main plot, making it less 
interesting and forgetful.

Shonen.

nothing does for thirty minutes at a time. The parts where things happen

minutes just showing the cool parts; If you shove all three movie's 
interesting parts together then MAYBE you'd have a good horror movie. 
Maybe.﻿
